EDIT::

Pamplemousse, Necco wafers are the consistency of antacid tablets but with more flavours. Most people don't like them, but I like them because they're one of the few candies that don't hurt my teeth and they have a calm flavour to them, the flavour isn't strong like most candies. They also don't melt and if they go bad, it takes a heck of a lot of time for them to do so. Pretty much all you have to do is keep them dry.
